item.title: Music
item.description: Deleting Spotify Spotify has been effective at being my one-stop shop for music discovery, storage, and listening for about a decade now. While convenient, I’ve been convinced that there are several compelling reasons1 to wean myself off it. Royalties For starters, it doesn’t pay small artists as much as I’d like; I end up buying albums directly anyway, so I’d prefer to make use of those purchases rather than just treat these digital album acquisitions as glorified tips.
